definitions.text: (architecture) a slender upright spire at the top of a buttress of tower
the highest level or degree attainable; the highest stage of development
examples: his landscapes were deemed the acme of beauty
the artist's gifts are at their acme
at the height of her career
...catapulted Einstein to the pinnacle of fame
so many highest superlatives achieved by man
at the top of his profession

definitions.text: raise on or as if on a pinnacle
examples: He did not want to be pinnacled
